Example of using [r2d3](https://rstudio.github.io/r2d3/) over previous custom [infographiq](https://github.com/marinebon/infographiq) (and [info-mb](https://github.com/marinebon/info-mb)) for creating interactivity in scalable vector graphic (svg) files. So far, only linking **pelagic** or **sandy beach** habitats.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(r2d3)

d <- read_csv("svg/svg_elements.csv") %>% 
  filter(svg == "overview.svg")

r2d3(
  script = "js/infographiq.js", 
  data=d, 
  options = list(
    svg           = "svg/overview.svg",
    color_default = "black",
    color_hover   = "yellow"))
```
